00027 class mem_file : public disk_queued_file
00028 {
00029     char * ptr;
00030     offset_type sz;
00031 
00032 public:
00035     mem_file(
00036         int queue_id = DEFAULT_QUEUE, int allocator_id = NO_ALLOCATOR) : disk_queued_file(queue_id, allocator_id), ptr(NULL), sz(0)
00037     { }
00038     void serve(const request * req) throw (io_error);
00039     ~mem_file();
